name: iText 7 RUPS - 7.2.4
body:
## What's Changed
* Add troubleshooting to README by @YoungJules in https://github.com/itext/i7j-rups/pull/15

## New Contributors
* @YoungJules made their first contribution in https://github.com/itext/i7j-rups/pull/15

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/itext/i7j-rups/compare/7.2.3...7.2.4

name: iText 7 RUPS - 7.2.3
body:
We always release our PDF debugging tool RUPS together with [iText 7 Core](https://itextpdf.com/en/products/itext-7/itext-7-core), as it is one of the most important dependencies (so all the goodies in Core also make their way into RUPS).

If you’ve been following the iText Research Teams recent adventures in livestreaming on our [YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/itext/videos), you might already know we’ve been making some RUPS-specific improvements. If you missed out though, you’ll be happy to learn the structure tree viewer now shows the text inside marked content items, which looks like this:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8547184/176679456-e950d818-26bc-45ec-8b96-bf6968a95400.png)

In addition, RUPS now comes with a Preferences file where you can configure some visual settings, set the default home folder, and allow duplicate files to be viewed. This is just the beginning though, so stay tuned for more developments on this front.

Happy debugging!
